Module.Name: Bank import
Module.Description: this file contains structural no information for the inventory module

Table.Name: bank_import
Table.Description: Contains information to import a bank statement

Field.Name: date
Field.Description: Specifies the date the transaction was made

Field.Name: anouncement
Field.Description: the anouncement that was send with the payment

Field.Name: account_number_to
Field.Description: the account number to which the money was transferd

Field.Name: amount
Field.Description: The amount which was transferd(only if one column is used)

Field.Name: credit_amount
Field.Description: The amount which was transferd(only if two columns are used)

Field.Name: debit_amount
Field.Description: The amount which was transferd(only if two columns are used)

Field.Name: debit_credit
Field.Description: Was your account debited or credited
